word: Dropsy and Disease of Heart Tend to Depress Ellen G. White. [SEE SELECTED MESSAGES, BOOK 2, PP. 233-245, "FORTITUDE AND AFFLICTION."]--Disease has pressed heavily upon me. For years I have been afflicted with dropsy and disease of the heart, which has had a tendency to depress my spirits and destroy my faith and courage.--1T 185 (1859).
